name: The Dark Tower (Beggars with no hope)
name_original: The Dark Tower (Beggars with no hope)
description:
A dungeon crawler made in one week via Processing.

We are aware of it´s sheer awfulness, however it only serves as a first attempt on programming a game. We won´t make a single dime from this 'game' because it is simply to bad. This game also includes properties in form of music,  prites, etc. from other games such as for example "The legend of Zelda Minish cap" or "Spec Ops The Line".

If you still want, for whatever reason, support us, then feel free to donate 0.01$.

Because frankly that is all that it´s worth. Although itch.io only let´s us choose 1$ as the lowest suggested donate option (should be 0.01$)

But we are beggars with no hope and will use every opportunity to recieve change.
